p: The chemical composition of abaxial and adaxial leaf sides were similar for sample S6. The main compounds identified were germacrene D (peak 19) with 17.0% on intact leaves, 26.0% on the abaxial side, 25.3% on the adaxial side, as well as the presence of Î±-bisabolol (peak 40) with 31.4% on intact leaves, 41.9% on the abaxial side, and 11.6% on the adaxial side.
